gurmukhi: ਸਰਵਰ ਮੈ ਨ ਜਾਨੀ ਦਾਦਰ ਕਮਲ ਗਤਿ ਮ੍ਰਿਗ ਮ੍ਰਿਗਮਦ ਗਤਿ ਅੰਤਰ ਨ ਜਾਨੀ ਹੈ
transliteration: Saravar Mai N Jaanee Daadar Kamal Gati , Mrig Mrigamad Gati Antar N Jaanee Hai ?
translation: A frog living in a pool is unaware of the presence of a lotus flower growing in the same pool. Even a deer is unaware of the musk pod that he is carrying within his body.

gurmukhi: ਮਨਿ ਮਹਿਮਾ ਨ ਜਾਨੀ ਅਹਿ ਬਿਖ੍ਰ ਬਿਖਮ ਕੈ ਸਾਗਰ ਮੈ ਸੰਖ ਨਿਧਿ ਹੀਨ ਬਕ ਬਾਨੀ ਹੈ
transliteration: Mani Mahimaa N Jaanee Ahi Bikhr Bikham Kai , Saagar Mai Sankh Nidhi Heen Bak Baanee Hai ?
translation: Just as a poisonous snake because of its poison is not aware of the invaluable pearl that he carries in his hood and a conch shell keeps wailing although it lives in the ocean but unaware of the wealth stored therein.

gurmukhi: ਚੰਦਨ ਸਮੀਪ ਜੈਸੇ ਬਾਂਸ ਨਿਰਗੰਧ ਕੰਧ ੳੁਲੂਅੈ ਅਲਖ ਦਿਨ ਦਿਨਕਰ ਧਿਅਾਨੀ ਹੈ
transliteration: Chandan Sameep Jaisay Baans Niragandh Kandha , Ulooai Alakh Din Dinakar Dhiaanee Hai ?
translation: As a bamboo plant remains bereft of fragrance despite living in the close proximity of a Sandalwood tree, and as an owl keeps his eyes shut during the day behaving ignorantly of the Sun,

gurmukhi: ਤੈਸੇ ਬਾਂਝ ਬਧੂ ਮਮ ਸ੍ਰੀ ਗੁਰ ਪੁਰਖ ਭੇਟ ਨਿਹਚਲ ਸੇਂਬਲ ਜਿੳੁ ਹੳੁਮੈ ਅਭਿਮਾਨੀ ਹੈ ||੨੩੬||
transliteration: Taisay Baanjh Badhoo Mam Sree Gur Purakh Bhayta , Nihachal Saynbal Jiu Haoumai Abhimaanee Hai ?236?
translation: Similarly, because of my ego and pride, I like an infertile woman remained fruitless despite acquiring the touch of True Guru. I am no better than the tall fruitless tree like silk Cotton. (236)
